Definition: Enter the date you served the documents
Enter details of the documents you served

HintText: Each document must be less than 100MB. You can upload the following file types: Word, Excel, Powerpoint, PDF, TXT, RTF, CSV, JPG, JPEG, BMP, PNG, TIF, TIFF

ElementLabel: Who did you serve the claim to?
HintText: Include their position if they have one, for example - partner, director
Definition: Enter the name of the person you served the documents to

ElementLabel: How did you serve the documents?
Definition: Select an option for how you served the documents

ElementLabel: Where did you serve the documents?
Definition: Enter the details of where you served the documents
HintText: Enter the postal address, email address, fax or DX number

ElementLabel: The location where you served the documents was the:
Definition: Select the person at whose location you served the documents

ElementLabel: Select the type of location where you served the documents
Definition: Select the type of location where you served the documents

HintText: Tell us the other type of location where you served the documents

Definition: Enter the name of your firm
Confirm that you believe that the facts stated in the application are true

ElementLabel:
## Statement of truth
The claimant(s) believes that the facts stated in the brief details of certificate of service are true. 

I am duly authorised by the claimant(s) to sign this statement.

The claimant(s) understands that proceedings for contempt of court may be brought against anyone who makes, or causes to be made, a false statement in a document verified by a statement of truth without an honest belief in its truth.
